translation.en: Stay in line, Rex.
translation.zh: 别乱跑 莱克斯

translation.en: Sorry, Nelson, I must show Her Majesty something important.
translation.zh:
抱歉 尼尔森
我有重要的东西要向女王陛下展示

translation.en: Watch your step, Philip.
translation.zh: 小心脚下 菲利普

translation.en: Oh, Rexy… what a fluffy tummy!
translation.zh: 噢 小莱莱…多么毛茸茸的肚肚呀！

translation.en: Oh, yes, just here.
translation.zh: 噢 真舒服 就是这里

translation.en: Blasted mutt!
translation.zh: 烦人的蠢狗！

translation.en: Dreadful manners!
translation.zh: 真没礼貌！

translation.en: Will he never learn?
translation.zh: 他就不能学好吗？

translation.en: What can I say? That's what you get, when you're Top Dog.
translation.zh:
我能说什么呢？
这就是首席狗狗的特权

translation.en: Oh, Rex, you are incorrigible!
translation.zh: 莱克斯 你真是没救了！

translation.en: In my day there was more to being Top Dog
translation.zh: 我年轻那会儿 首席狗狗可不能光会

translation.en: than nuzzling and fluffing.
translation.zh: 讨摸摸和翻肚皮

translation.en: Oh, really, Nelson?
translation.zh: 是吗 尼尔森？

translation.en: Did I tell you about the time I discovered the fire at Windsor Castle
translation.zh:
我跟你说过
我在温莎古堡发现火灾的事吗？

translation.en: and led the Royal family to safety?
translation.zh: 我把皇室一家领到了安全地带

translation.en: Only about three hundred times.
translation.zh: 你都说过三百遍了

translation.en: Selfless acts of courage, that's what it means to be Top Dog!
translation.zh:
无私奉献和勇气
那才是身为首席的意义！

translation.en: Yes, we all know you're a hero, Nelson,
translation.zh: 是 我们都知道你是个英雄 尼尔森

translation.en: but could he ever do this?
translation.zh: 但你会做这个吗？

translation.en: What an outrageous, irresistible puppy.
translation.zh: 真是条令人无法抗拒的萌狗狗

translation.en: I do what I can.
translation.zh: 正常发挥啦

translation.en: Dogs today, you don't appreciate how lucky you are!
translation.zh:
现在的狗都不懂得感恩了！
知道你有多幸运吗？

translation.en: You know, I am so popular,
translation.zh: 那可不 我多受欢迎呀

translation.en: Her Majesty is putting my picture on a mug,
translation.zh: 女王陛下把我的画像印在了杯子上

translation.en: smart phones, key fobs, mouse pads…
translation.zh: 还有智能手机、钥匙扣、鼠标垫…

translation.en: Caps!
translation.zh: 鸭舌帽！

translation.en: -Ballons, slippers, underpants… -Underpants…
translation.zh:
-气球、拖鞋、内裤…
-内裤…

translation.en: -Cards, umbrella… -Toilet brushes…
translation.zh:
-卡片、雨伞…
-马桶刷…

translation.en: And best of all, on the side of the Royal Train.
translation.zh:
最厉害的是
连皇家列车上都有我的头像

translation.en: Very impressive…
translation.zh: 真了不起…

translation.en: Alright, everyone. Tails up, we've got a State visit!
translation.zh:
好了 各位 尾巴翘起来
今天有国事访问！

translation.en: You been at the brandy again, Margaret?
translation.zh: 你又喝白兰地了吗 玛格丽特？

translation.en: Certainly not, look for yourselves.
translation.zh: 当然没有 你们自己看吧

translation.en: It's the President of the United States!
translation.zh: 是美国总统！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走！

translation.en: Hold on, we have not been sent for yet!
translation.zh: 等等 我们还没接到传唤呢！

translation.en: When you're the Top Dog, you know you're wanted!
translation.zh: 首席狗狗知道自己是被需要的！

translation.en: Maybe, we should all go.
translation.zh: 也许我们应该一起去

translation.en: Send for the Royal Corgis!
translation.zh: 呼叫皇室柯基！

translation.en: Send for the Royal Corgis!
translation.zh: 呼叫皇室柯基！

translation.en: The Royal cor…
translation.zh: 皇室柯…

translation.en: Last one there's a mongrel.
translation.zh: 最后一个到的是小杂种

translation.en: Someone give me a hand!
translation.zh: 谁来给我帮把手呀！

translation.en: You already got one!
translation.zh: 你已经有手了！

translation.en: Coming through! Eat my dust, Rex!
translation.zh: 我来喽！你输定了 莱克斯！

translation.en: Show some manners, will you!
translation.zh: 给我放规矩点！

translation.en: Out of my way… Ladies first!
translation.zh: 让一让…女士优先！

translation.en: Not me.
translation.zh: 不是我

translation.en: No my fault.
translation.zh: 不赖我

translation.en: Wasn't us.
translation.zh: 不关我们的事

translation.en: It's them.
translation.zh: 是他们

translation.en: Here we are.
translation.zh: 到喽

translation.en: How nice to see you Mr. President.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到您 总统先生

translation.en: Fantastic little place you got here, Liz.
translation.zh: 你这地方挺别致哟 莉兹

translation.en: It's so… how to say… understated.
translation.zh: 这里还真是…怎么说呢…非常低调呀

translation.en: Boy, that Corgi is ugly!
translation.zh: 天呐 那只柯基好丑！

translation.en: I've sniffed prettier bottoms.
translation.zh: 我见过的妞可比她漂亮多了

translation.en: Pity the poor chap who winds up with that creature!
translation.zh:
那家伙真可怜
居然摊上个这样儿的！

translation.en: Not exactly an oil painting yourself, Nelson.
translation.zh: 你自己也没多帅呀 尼尔森

translation.en: An honour to meet you, Ma'am. Royal selfie. Cheese steak!
translation.zh:
很荣幸见到您 女王阁下
皇家自拍 茄子！

translation.en: And who, pray, is this delightful little moppet?
translation.zh: 哎呀 这个可爱的小美妞是谁？

translation.en: That's the First Lady, Ma'am.
translation.zh: 是美国第一夫人

translation.en: No, I meant the…
translation.zh: 不 我是说…

translation.en: Oh, this is our beautiful pet dog, Mitzy, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 这是我们的宠物狗米琪 女王陛下

translation.en: Original from the great state of Texas.
translation.zh: 来自伟大的德克萨斯州

translation.en: She's delightful.
translation.zh: 她可真讨人喜欢

translation.en: We're going to find a mate for her.
translation.zh: 我们正打算为她择偶呢

translation.en: Only problem is, sourcing the right dog.
translation.zh:
唯一的问题就是
如何给她挑选真名天狗

translation.en: We want only the best, the very best.
translation.zh: 我们只想要狗中龙凤

translation.en: Perhaps she might like one of mine.
translation.zh: 也许她会喜欢我的其中一只狗狗

translation.en: The match could help cement our "special relationship".
translation.zh:
他们的结合还能有助于
巩固我们两国的“特殊关系”呢

translation.en: What a wonderful idea!
translation.zh: 真是个好主意！

translation.en: Alright then Mitzy, grab some puppy.
translation.zh: 那好吧 米琪 过去挑一挑

translation.en: Alright then.
translation.zh: 好呀

translation.en: So what we got here?
translation.zh: 我来看看都有什么货色？

translation.en: Too old, this one's a girl,
translation.zh: 这个太老、这个是女的

translation.en: too boring.
translation.zh: 这个太无趣

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: You're cute and fluffy.
translation.zh: 你很可爱 毛发蓬松

translation.en: -You'll do. -I think she has eye on this one.
translation.zh:
-就你了
-她似乎看上了这只

translation.en: Oh, Rexy, you lucky boy! We've found you a girlfriend!
translation.zh:
噢 小莱莱 你这幸运的小家伙！
你有女朋友啦！

translation.en: Girlfriend?!
translation.zh: 女朋友？

translation.en: Take me, stud muffin!
translation.zh: 带我走吧 帅哥！

translation.en: I don't suppose we can we have a recount?
translation.zh: 要不我们再考虑考虑？

translation.en: Charlie… help!
translation.zh: 查理…救命！

translation.en: What can I say, apparently you're the chosen one!
translation.zh:
我能说什么呢？
很显然 你是天选之子呀！

translation.en: I do love a Royal Wedding.
translation.zh: 我喜欢皇室婚礼

translation.en: I don't want to end up with her… She's…
translation.zh: 我不想跟她结婚…她很…

translation.en: Terrifying?
translation.zh: 吓人？

translation.en: You said it, Charlie.
translation.zh: 这话可是你说的 查理

translation.en: Careful. That hurts.
translation.zh: 当心点 好痛

translation.en: Here comes the bride, consider suicide!
translation.zh: 新娘子来喽 要考虑自杀吗？

translation.en: What if I say I'm not interested?
translation.zh: 如果我说对她没意思呢？

translation.en: I don't think she'll take no for an answer, Rex!
translation.zh: 我觉得她不会接受拒绝的 莱克斯！

translation.en: There's got to be a way…
translation.zh: 一定有办法…

translation.en: Not so cocky now, are we!
translation.zh: 这会儿狂不起来了吧！

translation.en: Come along, Rex… your lady's waiting!
translation.zh: 快来 莱克斯…你的女朋友在等着呢！

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Top Dog!
translation.zh: 首席狗狗！

translation.en: Daddy's got to go for a big meal with Her Elizabethness,
translation.zh: 爸爸要去跟伊丽莎白女王吃大餐了

translation.en: so you be a good girl, won't you?
translation.zh: 你要乖乖的哟 好吗？

translation.en: And if that little doggie upsets you,
translation.zh: 要是这条小狗子惹你不高兴了

translation.en: you come running to Daddy, okay, Princess?
translation.zh: 就跑过来找爸爸 好吗 小公主？

translation.en: Do come along, Donald,
translation.zh: 来吧 唐纳德

translation.en: let's leave these two lovebirds to get acquainted!
translation.zh:
我们让这两只小爱情鸟
彼此熟悉一下！

translation.en: Don't go, Your Majesty. Please!
translation.zh: 别走 女王陛下 求你了！

translation.en: Majesty… please.
translation.zh: 陛下…拜托

translation.en: Hey, little fella, stop whining.
translation.zh: 嘿 小子 别哼唧了

translation.en: Wanna go walkies?
translation.zh: 想去散步吗？

translation.en: I've already been today, thanks.
translation.zh: 我今天散过步了 谢谢

translation.en: What are you waiting for, come and join me.
translation.zh: 你还等什么呢 快进来找我呀

translation.en: Some other time maybe. Let's get something in the diary.
translation.zh:
下次吧
我们可以在日程簿上安排一下

translation.en: Help, please. Get off me. I need to go for a Royal wee!
translation.zh: 救命啊 放开我 我要尿尿！

translation.en: Mayday… We have a situation!
translation.zh: 呼叫支援…这里有情况！

translation.en: Oh, hush, little puppy.
translation.zh: 安静点儿 小狗子

translation.en: Get off me!
translation.zh: 放开我！

translation.en: Mitzy's going to take good care of you.
translation.zh: 米琪会好好照顾你的

translation.en: Sorry, you left me no other choice.
translation.zh: 抱歉 这都是你逼我的

translation.en: Playing hard to get, huh?
translation.zh: 玩欲擒故纵是吧？

translation.en: I like that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: What part of no don't you understand?
translation.zh:
“不要”这两个字
你是哪里听不明白呀？

translation.en: Both the N and the O.
translation.zh: 我的字典里就没这俩字

translation.en: Majesty, get me out of here…
translation.zh: 女王陛下 带我离开这里…

translation.en: Cutsey poo! We only live one.
translation.zh: 小帅哥！春宵一刻值千金哟

translation.en: Liz! Help!
translation.zh: 莉兹！救命！

translation.en: Time to reel him in.
translation.zh: 是时候拿下他了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Yeah! Pucker up, cowboy!
translation.zh: 没错！嘴巴撅起来 小牛仔！

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命啊！

translation.en: Liz, please, come back…
translation.zh: 莉兹 求你快回来吧…

translation.en: Listen, okay, I'll get my people to speak to your people
translation.zh: 听我说 我会让我的人去找你的人谈

translation.en: and your people can speak to my people and my people can tell your people to…
translation.zh:
你的人也可以跟我的人谈
我的人会跟你的人说…

translation.en: Get lost!
translation.zh: 走开！

translation.en: Hope you're ready for your first kiss. 'Cause I sure am.
translation.zh:
希望你准备好迎接初吻了
因为我已经准备好了

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: What? You don't like me?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你不喜欢我吗？

translation.en: Whatever gave you that impression?
translation.zh: 你怎么会这么想的？

translation.en: Wanna play rough, huh?
translation.zh: 喜欢玩野的是吧？

translation.en: You can run, but you can't hide!
translation.zh: 你逃不出我手掌心的！

translation.en: Wanna bet?
translation.zh: 想打赌吗？

translation.en: Okay, I am game.
translation.zh: 好啊 我奉陪

translation.en: Here I am, sugar pie.
translation.zh: 我来喽 小甜心

translation.en: I didn't know you Brits were into branding.
translation.zh:
我都不知道
原来你们英国人喜欢搞品牌营销呀

translation.en: Look at our union this way Rexy: it could be the merger of the century.
translation.zh:
小莱莱 你想呀 我们俩的结合
可以说是世纪大合并呢

translation.en: I mean the consolidation of two very powerful brands.
translation.zh: 两个大品牌的强强联合

translation.en: It could be huge!
translation.zh: 这可是了不起的大事呢！

translation.en: I love playing hide-and-seek. We are made for each other.
translation.zh: 我喜欢玩捉迷藏 我们真是天生一对

translation.en: Rexy puppy, where are you?
translation.zh: 莱莱小狗狗 你在哪里呀？

translation.en: I am getting hotter, I can feel it.
translation.zh: 我能感觉到 我越来越兴奋了

translation.en: In more ways than one.
translation.zh: 在很多方面

translation.en: Some Top Dog you are, hiding like a little pussy cat…
translation.zh:
你这样的首席狗狗
像只小猫咪一样躲起来…

translation.en: Found you!
translation.zh: 找到你喽！

translation.en: See you!
translation.zh: 再见喽！

translation.en: Royal selfie!
translation.zh: 皇家自拍！

translation.en: Cheesesteak!
translation.zh: 茄子！

translation.en: Get me out of here!
translation.zh: 放我出去！

translation.en: That's how you want to play it, huh?
translation.zh: 你想这么玩是吧？

translation.en: They buck broncos where I come from! Hang on. Here we go.
translation.zh:
在我老家 野马可是会踢人的！
等着瞧吧 我要发威了

translation.en: You ain't so bad at this!
translation.zh: 你小子还不赖嘛！

translation.en: But, let's see if you can fly, my love bird.
translation.zh: 不过 就看你能不能飞了 我的爱情鸟

translation.en: What qualities does the president have that first attracted you to him?
translation.zh:
你最初是被总统身上的
什么特质吸引的呢？

translation.en: Well, his nice head of hair
translation.zh: 是他的一头秀发

translation.en: and his very big hands does not hurt either.
translation.zh: 他那双大手也挺不错的

translation.en: Dinner is served.
translation.zh: 晚餐准备好了

translation.en: I'll pass, I don't like raw food.
translation.zh: 我就免了吧 我不爱吃生食

translation.en: -You call this British humour, no? -Sorry, Madam, I…
translation.zh:
-这是你们的英式幽默吗？
-抱歉 夫人 我…

translation.en: Footsie, huh?
translation.zh: 喜欢用脚调情？

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 您说什么？

translation.en: Tell me, Mr. President, what do you think of our English food?
translation.zh:
总统先生
您觉得我们英国的食物如何？

translation.en: It's fantastic.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: Mr. President!
translation.zh: 总统先生！

translation.en: I believe this is yours, Your Majesty!
translation.zh: 我想这是您的狗 女王陛下！

translation.en: You are very much in the doghouse, Rex!
translation.zh: 莱克斯 罚你待在狗屋不许出来！

translation.en: Naughty!
translation.zh: 淘气！

translation.en: Dismissed.
translation.zh: 快去

translation.en: You okay, Rex?
translation.zh: 你还好吗 莱克斯？

translation.en: I don't think I'm Her Majesty's Top Dog anymore.
translation.zh:
我觉得我不再是
女王陛下最宠爱的狗了

translation.en: Of course you are! Nothing would ever change that.
translation.zh:
你当然是！
这一点无论如何都不会变的

translation.en: I ruined everything.
translation.zh: 我把一切全搞砸了

translation.en: The President has cancelled his visit and gone back to America.
translation.zh: 那个总统已经取消访问 回美国去了

translation.en: I know you did not like the whole setup.
translation.zh: 我知道你不喜欢那段包办婚姻

translation.en: What did you do to her?
translation.zh: 可你到底对她做了什么啊？

translation.en: Not her, him.
translation.zh: 不是她 是他

translation.en: That creature is a "he"?
translation.zh: 那玩意是公的？

translation.en: No, the president!
translation.zh: 不 我说的是总统！

translation.en: The president? What happened?
translation.zh: 总统？发生什么事了？

translation.en: I bit the President in the unmentionables.
translation.zh: 我咬了总统的隐私部位

translation.en: I'm a disgrace to the Royal Family.
translation.zh: 我让皇室蒙羞了

translation.en: Well maybe in that case…
translation.zh: 好吧 这么说的话也许…

translation.en: I should just leave.
translation.zh: 我还是自己离开吧

translation.en: But where would you go?
translation.zh: 可你能去哪儿呢？

translation.en: No idea…
translation.zh: 不知道…

translation.en: -How about the Pope's house? -The Pope?
translation.zh:
-去教皇家怎么样？
-教皇？

translation.en: I bet he'd love a couple of puppies running round Vatican City.
translation.zh:
我猜他一定会喜欢几只狗狗
在梵蒂冈城跑来跑去的

translation.en: What do you think, Rex?
translation.zh: 怎么样 莱克斯？

translation.en: You know what Charlie? I like it!
translation.zh: 老实说 查理 我喜欢这主意！

translation.en: You do?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Absolutely, it'd be me and you, heading out on a whacky adventure.
translation.zh:
当然 你和我
并肩踏上一段不同寻常的冒险

translation.en: To the Papal Palace!
translation.zh: 前往教皇宫！

translation.en: When do we go?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候去？

translation.en: No time like the present!
translation.zh: 择日不如撞日呗！

translation.en: His Holiness, here we come!
translation.zh: 教皇大人 我们来啦！

translation.en: I'm excited!
translation.zh: 我好激动呀！

translation.en: I can't help it!
translation.zh: 人家忍不住嘛！

translation.en: Blasted dog… steals my slipper!
translation.zh: 可恶的傻狗…偷了我的拖鞋！

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: I've got an idea.
translation.zh: 我有个主意

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么声音？

translation.en: Sarge! We got a vase situation!
translation.zh: 萨吉！快来拯救花瓶！

translation.en: Careful, that's priceless.
translation.zh: 当心 这可是无价之宝

translation.en: We've got to make it to those bushes.
translation.zh: 我们得想办法跑到灌木丛那边去

translation.en: I'm having second thoughts, Charlie. It's a bit nippy out here…
translation.zh: 我改主意了 查理 这外面有点冷呀…

translation.en: And you know, it's Royal Jelly for breakfast!
translation.zh: 而且 明天的早餐是皇家果冻呢！

translation.en: Can't we go tomorrow?
translation.zh: 我们明天再走呗？

translation.en: Quick!
translation.zh: 快来！

translation.en: -Did you hear that, lad? -What, Sarge?
translation.zh:
-你听见了吗？
-听见什么？

translation.en: Probably some foxes running around.
translation.zh: 可能是有几只狐狸在乱跑吧

translation.en: Can't see a thing with this bloody hat.
translation.zh: 戴着这该死的帽子什么也看不见

translation.en: Now, take off your collar.
translation.zh: 好了 把你的项圈脱下来

translation.en: But the Queen gave me this when she made me Top Dog!
translation.zh:
可这是女王
把我封为首席狗狗时送给我的！

translation.en: Exactly, everyone will know who you are!
translation.zh: 没错 戴着它谁都能认出你来！

translation.en: We won't get five yards.
translation.zh: 我们会寸步难行

translation.en: Good thinking! The Pope's going to like you, Charlie.
translation.zh: 有道理！教皇一定会喜欢你的 查理

translation.en: But, how are we going to make it over that wall?
translation.zh: 可我们要怎么翻过那面墙呢？

translation.en: I know a way. Prince Phillip is having cable fitted.
translation.zh:
我知道一条路
菲利普亲王正在让人装电缆

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: It's a bit tight, but we can squeeze through.
translation.zh: 洞口有点小 但我们能钻过去

translation.en: Have you done it before, Charlie? You never told me you went outside.
translation.zh:
你以前去过外面吗 查理？
我从来没听你提起过

translation.en: Maybe once or twice. Bit of fun, you know.
translation.zh: 一两次吧 找点乐子

translation.en: You're a dark horse! Slash dog.
translation.zh: 你可真是深藏不露呀！

translation.en: There is a lot you don't know about me, Rex.
translation.zh: 你不了解我的地方还多着呢 莱克斯

translation.en: Rex, over here. Quick!
translation.zh: 莱克斯 这边 快！

translation.en: We are going to get caught.
translation.zh: 我们会被发现的

translation.en: Not if we keep moving. Hurry, this way.
translation.zh: 一直走就不会 快点 这边

translation.en: We made it.
translation.zh: 我们成功了

translation.en: Amazing. We are still in one piece.
translation.zh: 太神奇啦 我们居然毫发无伤

translation.en: Where are we?
translation.zh: 我们这是在哪儿？

translation.en: Is this Vatican City?
translation.zh: 这是梵蒂冈城吗？

translation.en: No, St. James's park.
translation.zh: 不 是圣詹姆斯公园

translation.en: We're being watched.
translation.zh: 有什么东西在盯着我们看

translation.en: -It this place haunted? -No, just keep walking.
translation.zh:
-这里闹鬼吗？
-不闹 继续走 别停下

translation.en: You probably saw some geese. They're everywhere.
translation.zh:
你可能是看到鹅了
那些家伙到处都是

translation.en: Do you mind if I whistle.
translation.zh: 我想吹口哨行吗？

translation.en: Yes, keep quiet.
translation.zh: 不行 安静点

translation.en: Hurry, this way!
translation.zh: 快 往这边跑！

translation.en: Charlie!
translation.zh: 查理！

translation.en: I don't like it out here, it's scary.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢外面的世界 外面好可怕

translation.en: Hush, Rex. Stop acting like an immature puppy.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 莱克斯 你成熟一点行吗？

translation.en: Charlie. I really do want to go home.
translation.zh: 查理 我真的好想回家

translation.en: Look, I know I behaved like a spoiled brat,
translation.zh: 我知道我表现得像个被宠坏的孩子

translation.en: but we should have never left the palace.
translation.zh: 但我们真不该离开皇宫的

translation.en: I'm afraid there is no going back.
translation.zh: 恐怕现在已经没有回头路了

translation.en: The queen loves me really.
translation.zh: 女王真的很爱我

translation.en: I know, I messed up, I know, but she'll forgive me,
translation.zh: 我知道 我闯了大祸 但她会原谅我的

translation.en: I am sure of it.
translation.zh: 她一定会的

translation.en: I am her Top Dog.
translation.zh: 我可是她的首席狗狗呀

translation.en: -Not anymore! -What are you talking about?
translation.zh:
-不再是了！
-你说什么？

translation.en: You had your chance, now it's my turn.
translation.zh:
你已经坐过那个位置
现在该轮到我了

translation.en: I was destined to be Top Dog, until you came along.
translation.zh:
首席狗狗原本就该是我
直到你的出现

translation.en: Charlie, have you lost your mind!?
translation.zh: 查理 你疯了吗？

translation.en: So long, imposter!
translation.zh: 再见了 冒牌货！

translation.en: Charlie, I am freezing.
translation.zh: 查理 我好冷

translation.en: I know!
translation.zh: 我知道！

translation.en: Charlie, you double cross…
translation.zh: 查理 你背信弃义…

translation.en: Goodbye, Top Dog.
translation.zh: 再见了 首席狗狗

translation.en: This must be heaven!
translation.zh: 这里一定是天堂吧！

translation.en: Oh, yes!
translation.zh: 好嘞！

translation.en: Fluff me, that feels real good!
translation.zh: 揉揉我吧 这感觉真好！

translation.en: Breathing fine. No injury to internal organs.
translation.zh: 呼吸正常 没有内脏受伤

translation.en: The belly rub, you really are spoiling me, Ma'am!
translation.zh: 肚皮按摩 你真要宠坏我了 女士！

translation.en: No frost bite. All looking good.
translation.zh: 没有冻伤 看起来平安无恙

translation.en: One immune booster suppository and you should fully recover.
translation.zh: 来一剂加强疫苗 你应该就能痊愈了

translation.en: Oh, yes, give me the full treatment!
translation.zh: 好呀 来给我全身按摩吧！

translation.en: You just crossed the line, Ma'am!
translation.zh: 你越界了 这位女士！

translation.en: Well, you're in perfect condition!
translation.zh: 你的状态很好嘛！

translation.en: Hang on, you're not Her Majesty!
translation.zh: 慢着 你不是女王陛下！

translation.en: No collar, no chip, must be a stray.
translation.zh: 没有项圈 没有芯片 看来是条流浪狗

translation.en: He is lucky you found him, Sanjay.
translation.zh: 桑杰 他可真走运 被你发现了

translation.en: Let me see if we can find a spot for him. The Kennel is pretty full.
translation.zh:
我看看能不能找个地方安置他
犬舍已经住满了

translation.en: Good morning, Ginger, do you have room for another guest?
translation.zh:
早上好 金吉
你这儿有地方容纳这位小客人吗？

translation.en: A corgi… we don't get to many of them around.
translation.zh: 一只柯基犬…这品种不常见呀

translation.en: I wonder what happened to him.
translation.zh: 真不知道他都经历了些什么

translation.en: Who knows. More and more irresponsible pet owners these days.
translation.zh:
谁知道呢 这年头
不负责任的宠物主人越来越多了

translation.en: That's for sure. Okay, I must be going.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛 好啦 我得走了

translation.en: See you later.
translation.zh: 回头见

translation.en: You look familiar, haven't you been in here before?
translation.zh: 你很眼熟呀 以前来过吧？

translation.en: Maybe not. Let's find you a good roommate.
translation.zh: 也许没有 我来给你找个好室友吧

translation.en: Some of the guests here can be pretty rowdy.
translation.zh: 这里有些小客人可是很粗暴的

translation.en: I don't know what you are up to,
translation.zh: 我不知道你想干什么

translation.en: but you've got to take me back to the palace pronto, my good man,
translation.zh: 但你得赶快把我送回皇宫去 小伙子

translation.en: before my disappearance becomes an national headline.
translation.zh:
不然我的失踪
就要成为国家头条新闻了

translation.en: Besides, I've got a score to settle with that rotter, Charlie!
translation.zh:
况且 我还有笔账
要跟查理那个混蛋算呢！

translation.en: Okay, let's go.
translation.zh: 好啦 我们走吧

translation.en: Where are we going? The exit is that way.
translation.zh: 你要带我去哪儿？出口在那边

translation.en: Who's a nice little puppy then?
translation.zh: 这只听话的小乖狗狗是谁呀？

translation.en: There you go, little fella.
translation.zh: 进去吧 小家伙

translation.en: Take me home now, my good man,
translation.zh: 马上送我回家 小伙子

translation.en: or you can kiss goodbye to a knighthood.
translation.zh: 否则就别想要骑士爵位了

translation.en: Jack and Chief will look after you.
translation.zh: 杰克和奇夫会照顾你的

translation.en: I don't belong in a cage. I'm the Queen's Corgi!
translation.zh:
我不该被关在笼子里
我是女王的柯基！

translation.en: This is dognapping.
translation.zh: 你这是绑架

translation.en: If the Queen finds out about this… you're in big trouble!
translation.zh: 要是被女王发现…你麻烦就大了！

translation.en: Keep the noise down, will you? It's Sunday and I'm having a lie in.
translation.zh:
别吵了行吗？
今天星期天 我要睡懒觉

translation.en: Excuse me!? Do you know who I am?
translation.zh: 你说什么？知道我是谁吗？

translation.en: Face don't ring a bell.
translation.zh: 这张脸没见过

translation.en: Chief?
translation.zh: 奇夫？

translation.en: He ain't got a clue either.
translation.zh: 他也没印象

translation.en: For your information, I am Rex, the Queen's Top Dog!
translation.zh:
那我告诉你
我是莱克斯 女王的首席狗狗！

translation.en: Oh, yeah? And I'm Napoleon, Emperor of France,
translation.zh: 是吗？那我还是法国皇帝拿破仑呢

translation.en: and this is Katniss Everdean from The Hunger Games.
translation.zh:
这位是《饥饿游戏》里的
凯妮丝艾佛丁

translation.en: No, really, I'm from the palace!
translation.zh: 不是 我说真的 我是从皇宫来的！

translation.en: You hear that? We got a Royal visit!
translation.zh: 听见没？咱们这儿有皇室造访喽！

translation.en: You don't believe me, do you?
translation.zh: 你不相信我 是吧？

translation.en: You can call yourself Lady Gaga, if you want, mate,
translation.zh: 哥们儿 你说你是嘎嘎女士都行

translation.en: just not while I'm kipping, alright.
translation.zh: 只要别在我睡觉时瞎嚷嚷 好吧

translation.en: Why you, impertinent, little street urchin!
translation.zh: 你这没礼貌的街头小混混！

translation.en: The name's Jack, and someone needs to fill you in…
translation.zh: 我叫杰克 你需要了解一下…

translation.en: on the dog house rules and that someone is me.
translation.zh: 犬舍的规矩 我现在就来教教你

translation.en: Rule One. Let sleeping dogs lie!
translation.zh: 规则第一条 别打扰其他狗睡觉！

translation.en: Rule Two!
translation.zh: 第二条！

translation.en: Keep your snout out of other dog's dinners.
translation.zh: 鼻子离别人的晚餐远点儿

translation.en: And Rule Three! There is no Fight Club!
translation.zh:
以及第三条！
搏击俱乐部的事要保密！

translation.en: -What's Fight Club? -What?
translation.zh:
-什么是搏击俱乐部？
-什么？

translation.en: -Fight club, what is it? -There is no Fight Club.
translation.zh:
-搏击俱乐部是什么？
-没有搏击俱乐部

translation.en: -So why did you mention it? -I didn't.
translation.zh:
-那你说它干什么？
-我没说啊

translation.en: He said Fight Club, didn't he?
translation.zh: 他刚才说的是搏击俱乐部吧？

translation.en: See.
translation.zh: 看吧？

translation.en: Weirdo.
translation.zh: 怪胎

translation.en: Rule Four.
translation.zh: 规则第四条

translation.en: Skip the induction, chappie,
translation.zh: 别给我做介绍了 小子

translation.en: I'll be out of this hellhole within the day.
translation.zh: 不出一日 我就会离开这鬼地方

translation.en: Rule Four! Newcomers kip on the floor!
translation.zh: 第四条！新来的睡地上！

translation.en: Breakfast everyone.
translation.zh: 早餐来喽 各位

translation.en: Whiskey smoked kippers for you, Lady Margaret.
translation.zh: 你的威士忌熏腌鱼 玛格丽特女士

translation.en: Full english, Nelson.
translation.zh: 你的全英式早餐 尼尔森

translation.en: Devilled kidneys for Charlie, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 还有查理的恶魔羊腰

translation.en: And Royal old cakes topped with royal jelly for you, Rex.
translation.zh:
还有你的老式皇家蛋糕
配皇家果冻 莱克斯

translation.en: Rex… Rex!? Oh, dear, where is he?
translation.zh: 莱克斯？天呐 莱克斯去哪儿了？

translation.en: Rex… Rex! Where are you? Rex.
translation.zh: 莱克斯！你在哪儿？

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Sorry if I was a bit narky earlier,
translation.zh: 抱歉 我之前有点暴躁

translation.en: I'm not good first thing.
translation.zh: 我有起床气

translation.en: How you getting on?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Awful, just awful.
translation.zh: 很糟 糟透了

translation.en: Her Majesty should be here by now.
translation.zh: 女王陛下怎么还没来呀？

translation.en: I am sure she has forgiven me.
translation.zh: 她一定已经原谅我了

translation.en: Cheer up, mate.
translation.zh: 振作点 伙计

translation.en: Rule Five. All dogs, I mean… most dogs get rehomed in the first month.
translation.zh:
规则第五条 这里所有的狗…
大部分的狗都会在一个月内被领养

translation.en: Cute little fella like you, shouldn't take long…
translation.zh: 像你这样的小可爱 应该要不了多久…

translation.en: Today's our weekly public viewing. Maybe you'll get lucky.
translation.zh:
今天是每周的开放参观日
没准就有人看上你了呢

translation.en: That said, most of us actually like it in here.
translation.zh: 话虽如此 我们大多都挺喜欢这儿的

translation.en: We got nice sleeping quarters, three meals a day…
translation.zh: 能有不错的寝室 一日三餐…

translation.en: Know what I mean?
translation.zh: 你懂我意思吗？

translation.en: No, I don't! And I don't want to be re-homed,
translation.zh: 不懂！我也不想被领养

translation.en: I want to go back to Buckingham P!
translation.zh: 我想回白金汉宫去！

translation.en: There's no helping some people.
translation.zh: 有些人真的是没救了

translation.en: But tell me, if you really are who you say you are,
translation.zh: 但你说说看 如果你真是皇室的狗

translation.en: how did you end up here?
translation.zh: 怎么会沦落到这里来？

translation.en: I mess up really bad and I got betrayed by my best friend.
translation.zh:
我闯了大祸
然后又被最好的朋友背叛了

translation.en: I have heard that one before… Right, Chief?
translation.zh: 这故事很耳熟呀…是吧 奇夫？

translation.en: This one hasn't spoken since I got here?
translation.zh: 从我来到这里 还没听他说过话呢

translation.en: Is he a still water running deep, or just a still water running…
translation.zh:
他是那种外冷内热型的
还是就纯粹是…

translation.en: still?
translation.zh: 沉默寡言？

translation.en: Dog Protection Society saved him.
translation.zh: 他是犬类保护协会救回来的

translation.en: He'd been starved by his owners.
translation.zh: 当时差点被主人饿死

translation.en: Knocked all the spirit out of him, they did.
translation.zh: 那些人害他生无可恋了

translation.en: Ghastly.
translation.zh: 太可怕了

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's the thing with us, lifers.
translation.zh: 是呀 这就是我们这些囚犯的遭遇

translation.en: We all been rejected sometime or other.
translation.zh: 都曾经被冷落、抛弃

translation.en: Public visit. Show your best.
translation.zh: 开放参观啦 好好表现哟

translation.en: Here we go. Viewing time!
translation.zh: 好嘞 参观时间到！

translation.en: Come and get me!
translation.zh: 选我选我！

translation.en: Fully house trained, family dog.
translation.zh: 我是训练有素的家庭犬

translation.en: Kind to kids, caring with cats, a buddy to budgies,
translation.zh:
对小孩很温柔
猫咪之友 虎皮鹦鹉的好伙伴

translation.en: I even got a reference from a rabbit!
translation.zh: 甚至还跟兔子交过朋友哦！

translation.en: I will never pee, on the settee, that's my guarantee.
translation.zh: 我可以保证 绝不会在沙发上撒尿

translation.en: Come on give us a whirl.
translation.zh: 来吧 给个机会嘛

translation.en: Majesty!
translation.zh: 女王陛下！

translation.en: It's your Top Dog, Rex!
translation.zh: 你的心肝宝贝莱克斯在这儿呢！

translation.en: She's here already? Nice going, kid.
translation.zh: 她这就来了？太好啦 孩子

translation.en: Bring me back to Buckingham Palace in the Bentley,
translation.zh: 把我带回白金汉宫吧 乘着你的宾利

translation.en: you right Royal Regina!
translation.zh: 你的皇家座驾！

translation.en: That's no Queen!
translation.zh: 他不是女王！

translation.en: Not so sure about that, pal.
translation.zh: 这可说不准噢 伙计

translation.en: Oh, she's never going to come!
translation.zh: 唉 她不会来了！

translation.en: Don't pick him, he don't know his "fetch" from his "heel"!
translation.zh: 别选他 他什么指令都听不懂！

translation.en: Besides he doesn't want to go. Give us a break here!
translation.zh: 而且他也不想走 别来打扰我们！

translation.en: I think he likes me! Yes…
translation.zh: 我觉得他喜欢我！是的…

translation.en: He can't keep his eyes of me. This must be my lucky day.
translation.zh:
他都移不开眼了
今天一定就是我的幸运日啦

translation.en: I am out of here…
translation.zh: 我要离开这里…

translation.en: Don't leave, mate. It won't happen again, please.
translation.zh: 别走呀 我保证不会再有下次了 拜托

translation.en: I'm an easy going dog…
translation.zh: 我性情很温和的…

translation.en: just got a bladder the size of a pea is all!
translation.zh: 只不过膀胱有点小罢了！

translation.en: I can't believe it. I was so close and I messed it up…
translation.zh:
真难以置信
就差那么一点点 却被我给搞砸了…

translation.en: Oh, well, pal. Guess you're just like me and him.
translation.zh:
好吧 伙计
看来我们三个是同病相怜呀

translation.en: Unwanted.
translation.zh: 一样没人要

translation.en: I am the Queen's Top Dog! I am nothing like you!
translation.zh:
我是女王的首席狗狗！
我跟你们不一样！

translation.en: Rexy! Come here, boy! Mummy's got some Royal Jelly for you!
translation.zh:
小莱莱！过来呀 宝贝！
妈咪给你准备了皇家果冻噢！

translation.en: -Rex! -Rex!
translation.zh:
-莱克斯！
-莱克斯！

translation.en: Oh, for goodness sake. Stop this nonsense, Rex!
translation.zh: 天啊 别胡闹了 莱克斯！

translation.en: Come out at once!
translation.zh: 马上出来！

translation.en: Rex… Come on, Rex.
translation.zh: 莱克斯…快出来吧

translation.en: -Come on, boy… -Rex!
translation.zh:
-出来呀 小子…
-莱克斯！

translation.en: -Rex! -Rex!
translation.zh:
-莱克斯！
-莱克斯！

translation.en: Unfortunately, no sign, Ma'am.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 毫无踪迹 女士

translation.en: Keep searching, he can't have gone far.
translation.zh: 继续找 他不可能走远的

translation.en: Here we go again.
translation.zh: 又来了

translation.en: That mutt is probably chasing some rabbit around the park.
translation.zh: 那傻狗没准正在公园里追兔子呢

translation.en: Rex!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！

translation.en: Forget about Rex, it's almost lunchtime and I'm thirsty!
translation.zh:
别管莱克斯了
这都快午餐时间了 我好渴呀！

translation.en: -Rex! -Rex, where are you?
translation.zh:
-莱克斯！
-莱克斯 你在哪儿？

translation.en: Where are you, Rex? Where are you?
translation.zh: 你跑哪儿去了 莱克斯？

translation.en: -Rexy! -Where are you?
translation.zh:
-小莱莱！
-你在哪儿呀？

translation.en: -Rex, please! -Rex!
translation.zh:
-莱克斯 快出来吧！
-莱克斯！

translation.en: Charlie, what have you found?
translation.zh: 查理 你找到什么了？

translation.en: Rex's golden collar!
translation.zh: 莱克斯的金项圈！

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: He's been eaten by… foxes!
translation.zh: 他被狐狸…吃掉了！

translation.en: Blasted vermin! I'll get the shotgun!
translation.zh: 该死的害虫！我去拿猎枪！

translation.en: It's too late, Philip. He's gone.
translation.zh: 太迟了 菲利普 他已经不在了

translation.en: Poor Charlie,
translation.zh: 可怜的查理

translation.en: Rex was your best friend.
translation.zh: 莱克斯是你最好的朋友呀

translation.en: Who's that?
translation.zh: 那是谁？

translation.en: That big fellow, that's Bernard St Bernard.
translation.zh: 那个大家伙是伯纳德圣伯纳德

translation.en: Bernard was one of the finest actors in the country.
translation.zh: 伯纳德是本国最优秀的演员之一

translation.en: Career was going great, then the tummy trouble kicked in…
translation.zh:
原本事业一帆风顺
可后来肠胃出了问题…

translation.en: No, I meant him.
translation.zh: 不 我是说他

translation.en: This is Al.
translation.zh: 那是艾尔

translation.en: Al was the best sniffer dog in Heathrow Airport,
translation.zh: 希思罗机场嗅觉最灵敏的嗅探犬

translation.en: till he got too good.
translation.zh: 但有点过分灵敏了

translation.en: Know what I mean?
translation.zh: 你懂我意思吗？

translation.en: No, I meant him.
translation.zh: 不 我说的是他

translation.en: What is happening?
translation.zh: 他在搞什么？

translation.en: Just sit back and watch.
translation.zh: 坐好了 等着瞧吧

translation.en: What is going on here?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？

translation.en: Follow me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: Hey, that's great, but question.
translation.zh: 那招真漂亮 但我有一个问题

translation.en: If it's so easy to get out, why don't you all just run away?
translation.zh:
既然这么容易就能出去
你们为什么不逃跑呢？

translation.en: England in the winter!? It's freezing out there, mate!
translation.zh:
去体验英国的冬天吗？
外面冷的要死呀 哥们儿！

translation.en: I'm not afraid of a little cold.
translation.zh: 我不怕冷

translation.en: Go right ahead, be my guest, you'll find the exit that way.
translation.zh: 随你的便吧 直走就能找到出口了

translation.en: I hope you know your way around town, it's a big and a dangerous place.
translation.zh:
但愿你认识城里的路
那可是个又大又危险的地方

translation.en: The Queen will come, I'm sure!
translation.zh: 我相信 女王一定会来的！

translation.en: Where are you all going, Jack?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪儿 杰克？

translation.en: Fight club.
translation.zh: 搏击俱乐部

translation.en: Didn't think there was a Fight Club.
translation.zh: 不是说没有搏击俱乐部吗？

translation.en: Wait for me, Jack!
translation.zh: 等等我 杰克！

translation.en: Welcome, to another night of Fight Club!
translation.zh: 欢迎再次光临搏击俱乐部之夜！

translation.en: The biggest underground fighting venue in the City of London.
translation.zh: 这里是伦敦市最大的地下搏击场

translation.en: Where only the brave die young and the strong survive.
translation.zh: 勇者英年早逝 强者才能生存

translation.en: So, get ready to rumble,
translation.zh: 那么 大家拭目以待吧

translation.en: because we've got another great match up for you tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚即将展开又一场精彩的对决

translation.en: Who's Mr. Muscles?
translation.zh: 那个肌肉男是谁？

translation.en: Tyson, Pitbull Terrier.
translation.zh: 斗牛犬泰森

translation.en: Used to be a champion fighting dog, till he was impounded.
translation.zh: 他以前是格斗冠军 后来被拘留了

translation.en: Rule Six. Never cross Tyson.
translation.zh: 规则第六条 千万别招惹泰森

translation.en: On tonight's bill, in the red corner, it's Boxer the Boxer!
translation.zh:
今晚的对战表上
红方是拳击手波克塞！

translation.en: And he is up against Rebel, the Doberman cross!
translation.zh: 他的对手是杜宾犬瑞宝！

translation.en: And I'm offering two to one on Boxer, no bets smaller than this.
translation.zh:
波克塞的赔率是二比一
不接受比这更小的赌注

translation.en: In here, we do what Tyson says. He's Top Dog.
translation.zh: 在这里 我们都要听泰森的 他是老大

translation.en: Hey Chief, when are you gonna come down and fight?
translation.zh: 奇夫 你打算什么时候下场出战？

translation.en: Big dog like you.
translation.zh: 像你这样的大狗

translation.en: But first, the pre-match entertainment.
translation.zh: 但首先 赛前娱乐节目

translation.en: Give it up for the wondrous wanderer, Wanda!
translation.zh: 有请神奇的流浪者 旺达！

translation.en: I'm the type of girl that likes to roam around
translation.zh: 我喜欢四处游荡

translation.en: I'm never in one place
translation.zh: 从不在一处停留

translation.en: I roam from town to town…
translation.zh: 我走过一城又一镇…

translation.en: Hi there, big boy.
translation.zh: 你好呀 小伙子

translation.en: And when I find myself
translation.zh: 当我发现自己

translation.en: Falling for some guy
translation.zh: 爱上一个男人

translation.en: Yeah, I hop right into a car of mine
translation.zh: 对 我跳上自己的车

translation.en: And drive around the world.
translation.zh: 环游世界

translation.en: They call me The Wanderer
translation.zh: 他们叫我流浪者

translation.en: Yeah, The Wanderer
translation.zh: 是的 流浪者

translation.en: I roam around…
translation.zh: 我四处游荡…

translation.en: Forget it, pal, she's Tyson's girl.
translation.zh: 别做梦了 小子 她是泰森的妞

translation.en: Only because she hasn't met me yet!
translation.zh: 那是因为她还没遇见我！

translation.en: I kiss them and I love them Cause to me they're all the same
translation.zh: 我吻 我爱 对我而言 他们都一样

translation.en: Except you, big boy, that is…
translation.zh: 除了你 小伙子 那是…

translation.en: I hug them and I squeeze them They don't even know my name
translation.zh:
我拥抱 紧紧拥抱
他们甚至不知道我的名字

translation.en: Rex, you're drooling.
translation.zh: 莱克斯 你流口水了

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 停！

translation.en: Settle down, doggies, the bets are in.
translation.zh: 坐好了 狗崽子们 投注完毕

translation.en: Good to go, Boxer? Rebel, ready?
translation.zh:
拳击手 准备好了吗？
瑞宝 准备好了吗？

translation.en: It's time to rumble!
translation.zh: 战斗开始！

translation.en: I can't watch this, it's…
translation.zh: 我看不下去了 真是…

translation.en: Horrible!
translation.zh: 太可怕了！

translation.en: It's just so horrible to think of what the foxes did to him.
translation.zh:
一想到那些狐狸对他做的事
我的心都要碎了

translation.en: We need to give him a proper funeral.
translation.zh: 我们得给他办一场体面的葬礼

translation.en: But, I'm afraid there is nothing left to bury, dear.
translation.zh:
但我恐怕他没剩下什么
可给我们葬的了 亲爱的

translation.en: Even so, I would do no less for you, Philip.
translation.zh: 换做是你 我也会尽心筹办的 菲利普

translation.en: Quite reassuring… indeed.
translation.zh: 这话还真是…令人安心呢

translation.en: I wonder, how did he get like this?
translation.zh: 他怎么会变成这样的？

translation.en: Dunno. Shares a cage with a Chihuahua.
translation.zh: 不知道呀 跟他同屋的是一只吉娃娃

translation.en: You're awake early, Rex.
translation.zh: 你醒得可真早呀 莱克斯

translation.en: Been up for hours, thinking about last night!
translation.zh:
我都醒来好几个小时了
一直在想昨晚的事！

translation.en: Don't worry, lad, the fights ain't that bad.
translation.zh: 别担心 小伙子 对决其实没那么惨烈

translation.en: Not about the fight, about Wanda. She's hot!
translation.zh: 不是对决的事 是旺达 她真性感！

translation.en: Want my advice? Forget about her.
translation.zh: 我给你个建议吧？忘了她

translation.en: Wish I could, but she's caught me hook, line and sinker.
translation.zh:
我也想呀
但她已经把我的魂都勾走了

translation.en: You don't stand a chance, mate!
translation.zh: 你没戏的 朋友！

translation.en: Au contraire, mon ami,
translation.zh: 恰恰相反 朋友

translation.en: there's nothing a lady likes more than refined breeding.
translation.zh:
像我这种精心培育的品种犬
最讨姑娘家喜欢啦

translation.en: Breakfast! Okay, everyone, breakfast is served.
translation.zh: 早餐时间到！好了 大伙儿 开饭喽

translation.en: Breakfast is ready.
translation.zh: 早餐准备好了

translation.en: Don't look at me like that, I tried to tell him!
translation.zh: 别这么看着我 我试过警告他了！

translation.en: Oh, no, he is nuts!
translation.zh: 糟糕 这小子疯了！

translation.en: Miss Wanda, allow me to introduce myself.
translation.zh: 旺达小姐 请容我自我介绍一下

translation.en: The name is Rex, Corgi of the most noble provenance.
translation.zh: 我叫莱克斯 出身最高贵的柯基犬

translation.en: You what?
translation.zh: 你什么？

translation.en: Forgive my importunate manner,
translation.zh: 请原谅我的纠缠不休

translation.en: but I admit to being rather seduced by your exquisite canine charms.
translation.zh:
但我得承认
我被你优雅的魅力深深吸引了

translation.en: Why do I always get the nutter?
translation.zh: 我怎么总是招来烂桃花？

translation.en: Perhaps we could get formally acquainted over breakfast.
translation.zh: 我们共进早餐 正式熟悉一下吧？

translation.en: I wouldn't touch that if I was you.
translation.zh: 我劝你别碰那碗里的东西

translation.en: Not exactly Michelin Star, is it?
translation.zh: 达不到米其林水准 对吧？

translation.en: But it's as good as we're likely to get in this dump.
translation.zh: 但在这破地方 已经算不错了

translation.en: He is dead.
translation.zh: 他死定了

translation.en: If Tyson sees you eating from his bowl, you're done.
translation.zh:
要是被泰森看到
你吃他碗里的食物 你就完蛋了

translation.en: Come, come, my dear.
translation.zh: 来吧 亲爱的

translation.en: He'll soon fall into line once he knows I'm the Queen's Top Dog!
translation.zh:
一旦他知道了我是女王的首席狗狗
马上就会服服帖帖的了！

translation.en: -You really are crazy, aren't you? -Only for you, my darling.
translation.zh:
-你真是个疯子
-为你痴狂 亲爱的

translation.en: Now, sooner or later, someone's going to rescue me from this flea pit
translation.zh:
迟早会有人来把我
从这个破地方救出去

translation.en: and then I'll whisk you away…
translation.zh: 到时候我带你一起走…

translation.en: Excuse me, I'm talking to the lady.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我在跟这位女士说话

translation.en: Nosey nose out! Where was I?
translation.zh: 别偷听 闪一边去！我说到哪儿了？

translation.en: Ah, yes!
translation.zh: 啊 对了！

translation.en: I'll whisk you away to a life of fine dining,
translation.zh:
我会带你去过好日子
那里有精致的美食

translation.en: velvet cushions and men in powdered wigs
translation.zh:
天鹅绒坐垫
还有戴着扑粉假发的人类

translation.en: proffering Royal Jelly for tea.
translation.zh: 为我们奉上皇家果冻配下午茶

translation.en: I said tootle off, beefcake, or you'll get a severe tongue lashing!
translation.zh: 都说了让你走开 大块头 想挨骂吗？

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Tyson, don't hurt him, he's just a crazy, little…
translation.zh: 泰森 别伤害他 他就是个小疯子…

translation.en: He ain't no dog, he's a pussycat.
translation.zh: 他才不是狗呢 他是只小猫咪

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: I told you not to get involved with strays, Rex.
translation.zh: 我警告过你了 别招惹流浪狗 莱克斯

translation.en: Especially, if they're going out with Tyson.
translation.zh: 尤其是跟着泰森混的那一群

translation.en: You all saw what happened, Wanda stood up for me.
translation.zh: 你们都看到了 刚才旺达替我求情呢

translation.en: Well sort of, listen, Rex. Forget about her.
translation.zh: 算是吧 听着 莱克斯 别再想她了

translation.en: She is really hot, but she will be nothing but trouble.
translation.zh:
她是很漂亮没错
但她只会给你招来麻烦

translation.en: What went wrong? I hit her with all my best lines!
translation.zh:
到底哪儿出了问题？
我都拿出看家本领搭讪了！

translation.en: You need to walk it off, dude.
translation.zh: 你给我下去

translation.en: If you ever decide to do that again, remember one thing.
translation.zh: 要是你还想再去找她 记住一件事

translation.en: We don't know you, alright?
translation.zh: 我们不认识你 好吧？

translation.en: Yes, I got it.
translation.zh: 是 我知道了

translation.en: Thanks a lot, but I don't drink coffee!
translation.zh: 谢谢 但我不喝咖啡！

translation.en: "Rex, the Queen's Top Dog!"
translation.zh: “莱克斯 女王的首席狗狗！”

translation.en: He was telling the truth!
translation.zh: 他说的是真的！

translation.en: Hey, you!
translation.zh: 喂 你！

translation.en: We better go. Tyson is never far away.
translation.zh: 我们快走吧 泰森一定就在附近

translation.en: Best of luck, Rex. Break a leg.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 莱克斯 加油哦

translation.en: Yeah, that's what I am afraid of.
translation.zh: 我怕会被打断腿

translation.en: Beat it, losers!
translation.zh: 走开 废物！

translation.en: Not you…
translation.zh: 我没说你…

translation.en: Your Highness.
translation.zh: 首席大人

translation.en: Beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Sorry about earlier. Tyson gets very jealous.
translation.zh: 刚才真对不起 泰森是个醋坛子

translation.en: He nearly broke my back.
translation.zh: 他差点打折我的背

translation.en: No! Where? Here?
translation.zh: 不是吧！伤哪儿了？这里吗？

translation.en: Bit further down.
translation.zh: 再往下一点

translation.en: -There? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-这里吗？
-对

translation.en: What about there?
translation.zh: 那这里呢？

translation.en: Oh, that's the spot!
translation.zh: 噢 就是这儿！

translation.en: You know, I find you very attractive, Rex.
translation.zh: 我发现你很有魅力 莱克斯

translation.en: You've got noble bearing.
translation.zh: 你有高贵的气质

translation.en: Strong… teeth.
translation.zh: 强健的…牙齿

translation.en: Fluffy belly.
translation.zh: 松软的肚子

translation.en: I try to look after myself.
translation.zh: 我注重保养

translation.en: The kind of dog, a girl would stray for.
translation.zh:
是那种会让女孩子
情愿追随流浪的帅哥

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Isn't it obvious?
translation.zh: 这难道还不明显吗？

translation.en: I've been crazy about you since I first saw you!
translation.zh: 打从第一眼见到你 我就被俘虏了！

translation.en: -At the Fight Club? -That's it! You were sitting on the right.
translation.zh:
-在搏击俱乐部那晚吗？
-没错！你就坐在右边

translation.en: -The left. -Right.
translation.zh:
-左边
-对

translation.en: Your left. I couldn't take my eyes off you.
translation.zh:
是你的左边
我简直没法把视线从你身上移开

translation.en: You're the dog of my dreams, Rex.
translation.zh: 你就是我的梦中情人 莱克斯

translation.en: Now you've walked into my life and turned it upside down.
translation.zh:
现在你走进了我的生活
把它搅得天翻地覆了

translation.en: You did that to me, Wanda. Literally.
translation.zh: 这正是我想说的 旺达 真的

translation.en: Is that offer of Buckingham Palace still available?
translation.zh:
你之前说要带我去白金汉宫
还算数吗？

translation.en: For you Wanda, anything!
translation.zh: 为了你 旺达 我做什么都可以！

translation.en: You've made me so happy, I want to tell the world!
translation.zh:
我真的好开心
我想让全世界都知道！

translation.en: I wish you wouldn't, you know what Tyson's like.
translation.zh: 最好不要 你知道泰森那暴脾气

translation.en: Rex? Rex.
translation.zh: 莱克斯？

translation.en: Hit it, fellas!
translation.zh: 伴奏 朋友们！

translation.en: And they called it
translation.zh: 他们都说

translation.en: Puppy love!
translation.zh: 初恋懵懂！

translation.en: I guess they'll never know…
translation.zh: 但他们永远不会明白…

translation.en: What if Tyson sees us?
translation.zh: 万一被泰森看见了怎么办？

translation.en: How a young heart really feels…
translation.zh: 一颗年轻的心是如何悸动…

translation.en: Care to dance, my Lady?
translation.zh: 来跳支舞吧 我的女孩？

translation.en: I'd prefer not to…
translation.zh: 还是不要了吧…

translation.en: How a young heart really feels
translation.zh: 一颗年轻的心是如何悸动

translation.en: And why I love her so.
translation.zh: 我为何爱她如此之深

translation.en: Wanda, we were destined to be together.
translation.zh: 旺达 我们是命中注定的一对

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: And they call it puppy love
translation.zh: 他们都说 初恋懵懂

translation.en: Just because we're in our teens.
translation.zh: 只因你我青春年少

translation.en: Would you prefer the wedding at St. Paul's or Westminster Abbey?
translation.zh:
你想在圣保罗大教堂
还是威斯敏斯特教堂办婚礼？

translation.en: I told you to keep away from me girl!
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 离我的妞远点儿！

translation.en: I say, back off. I'm not quite done here.
translation.zh: 让开 我还没唱完呢

translation.en: Someone help me, please
translation.zh: 谁来帮帮我 帮帮我呀 拜托

translation.en: This is not a puppy love
translation.zh: 这不是懵懂初恋

translation.en: Not… a… puppy love
translation.zh: 不…是…懵懂的初恋

translation.en: This is not…
translation.zh: 这不是…

translation.en: A puppy love.
translation.zh: 青涩的爱恋

translation.en: Fool!
translation.zh: 蠢货！

translation.en: You just signed yourself up for Fight Club!
translation.zh: 搏击俱乐部下一场 你来出战！

translation.en: Dear Rexy, gone forever.
translation.zh: 亲爱的莱克斯 就这么与世长辞了

translation.en: Cheer up, old girl. He was only a bloody bow-wow.
translation.zh: 振作点 大姑娘 他不过就是只狗而已

translation.en: Do shut up, Philip.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 菲利普

translation.en: You're upset too, aren't you, Charlie?
translation.zh: 你也很伤心对吧 查理？

translation.en: How would you like to be my new Top Dog?
translation.zh: 你想做我的新任首席狗狗吗？

translation.en: Where exactly are you taking me?
translation.zh: 你到底要带我去哪里？

translation.en: To the laundry room,
translation.zh: 洗衣房

translation.en: so Boxer does not take you to the cleaner.
translation.zh: 免得你到时候被波克塞完虐

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: It means you gotta go learn the basics. You'll need all the help you can get.
translation.zh:
意思是 你得学习基本技巧
我们会倾囊相授

translation.en: Butch's record? 76 Bouts - 75 knock outs.
translation.zh: 布奇的战绩是76战 击败75次

translation.en: He better get ready for his 76th.
translation.zh: 那他就准备迎接自己的第76败吧

translation.en: They didn't knock him out, he knocked them out.
translation.zh: 不是对手击败他 是他击败对手

translation.en: He just suffered one defeat.
translation.zh: 他只输过一次

translation.en: Alright then, so I still have a chance.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我还是有机会的

translation.en: He lost against Tyson.
translation.zh: 他输给了泰森

translation.en: Oh, he's going to kill me!
translation.zh: 噢 他会杀了我！

translation.en: You might get away with a light maiming.
translation.zh: 你没准可以只受点轻伤

translation.en: You got to take a chill pill man, ease it down.
translation.zh: 哥们 心态放轻松一点 淡定

translation.en: Perhaps I can be of some assistance.
translation.zh: 也许我可以帮忙

translation.en: I used to do all my own stunts when I was younger.
translation.zh:
我年轻那会儿
特技动作都是自己上的

translation.en: You need to learn how to roll with the punches.
translation.zh: 你得学会从容应对 见招拆招

translation.en: Pick your opening and strike like a coiled cobra!
translation.zh: 找准空隙 像眼镜蛇一样火速出击！

translation.en: Besides, do you remember the old movie, Rocky!
translation.zh: 另外 记得那部老电影《洛奇》吗？

translation.en: The underdog won in the end!
translation.zh: 无名小卒最终取得了胜利！

translation.en: Rocky lost, Bernard.
translation.zh: 洛奇输了 伯纳德

translation.en: Rocky II?
translation.zh: 《洛奇2》呢？

translation.en: Consider yourself lucky, you've got the best coaching team around.
translation.zh:
算你走运
你身边有最出色的教练团队

translation.en: I just want to survive.
translation.zh: 我只想保命

translation.en: Okay, let's start with the basic fitness routine.
translation.zh:
好的 我们就从
最基本的健身训练开始吧

translation.en: Jump in and show me you can run.
translation.zh: 跳进去 给我展示一下你的跑动能力

translation.en: This is not going to work.
translation.zh: 这样行不通的

translation.en: What if I gave him some acting lesson on how to play dead?
translation.zh:
要不我给他上几节表演课
教教他怎么装死吧？

translation.en: We're gonna need a real plan B, Bernard.
translation.zh:
我们需要一个
靠谱的备用计划 伯纳德

translation.en: Follow me.
translation.zh: 跟我来

translation.en: You better study carefully the layout of this place.
translation.zh: 你要仔细研究这里的布局

translation.en: Boxer is quite heavy. Like Bernard said.
translation.zh: 波克塞很笨重 正如伯纳德所说

translation.en: Pick your opening.
translation.zh: 找准空隙

translation.en: - And? - Run and hide.
translation.zh:
-然后呢？
-逃跑 躲起来

translation.en: Time for… Fight Club!
translation.zh: 搏击俱乐部时间到！

translation.en: Wait… Stop it right there!
translation.zh: 等等…打住！

translation.en: As the Queen's Corgi, I command you not to open that door!
translation.zh:
身为女王的柯基
我命令你不准打开那扇门！

translation.en: It's already open, what's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 门是开着的 你脑子秀逗了吗？

translation.en: Oh, let him be, I'll take it from here.
translation.zh: 别管他了 交给我吧

translation.en: He's got stage fright. Come on, Rex.
translation.zh: 他有点怯场 来吧 莱克斯

translation.en: I… I can't bear the sight of blue blood!
translation.zh: 我…我害怕见血！

translation.en: Don't worry, it will be over before you know it.
translation.zh: 别担心 一眨眼的功夫就结束了

translation.en: Be strong, Rex, I believe in you.
translation.zh: 坚强点 莱克斯 我相信你

translation.en: Thanks, Wanda.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 旺达

translation.en: Well, look who is here.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这是谁来啦

translation.en: I was starting to think you would be a no-show.
translation.zh: 我还以为你不敢来了呢

translation.en: Ladies and gentleman,
translation.zh: 女士们先生们

translation.en: please give a warm welcome to our royal champ.
translation.zh: 请大家热烈欢迎我们的皇家小冠军

translation.en: Today's bet three to one the corgi lasts under a minute.
translation.zh:
今天的赔率是三比一
赌这只柯基坚持不到一分钟

translation.en: Go for it Rex, we're here for you.
translation.zh: 加油 莱克斯 我们支持你

translation.en: I am with you, Rex.
translation.zh: 我支持你 莱克斯

translation.en: Thanks, Boxer, but you don't have to fight tonight.
translation.zh: 谢了 波克塞 但今晚不用你出手

translation.en: My friends… what do you say we change the odds to… 60 to one.
translation.zh:
朋友们…要不我们把赔率改成…
60比1吧

translation.en: For your greatest pleasure and mine…
translation.zh: 为了让大家和我都尽兴…

translation.en: I will destroy this pathetic puppy myself.
translation.zh: 我会亲手灭了这只可悲的小狗崽子

translation.en: Hey, that was not the deal.
translation.zh: 你怎么临时变卦呀？

translation.en: Might we find a more civilized way to settle this?
translation.zh: 我们能找一个更文明的解决办法吗？

translation.en: You're dead!
translation.zh: 你死定了！

translation.en: Looks like we are about to lose another cell mate, pal.
translation.zh: 看来我们又要失去一位室友了 伙计

translation.en: In the red corner: Me!
translation.zh: 红方是：我！

translation.en: In the blue corner: My dinner!
translation.zh: 蓝方是：我的晚餐！

translation.en: I'm too fluffy to die!
translation.zh: 我这么毛茸茸的 不适合死呀！

translation.en: Remember the plan, Rex. Get out of the way as fast as you can.
translation.zh:
记住我们的计划 莱克斯
用尽最快速度逃跑

translation.en: This is going to be ugly.
translation.zh: 接下来会很凶残的

translation.en: Got it!
translation.zh: 收到！

translation.en: Well, it looks like
translation.zh: 哎呦呦 看来

translation.en: your boyfriend's bitten off more than he can chew.
translation.zh: 你这小男友还真是不自量力呀

translation.en: Come on, Tyson, let him be!
translation.zh: 拜托 泰森 饶了他吧！

translation.en: Let's have some fun,
translation.zh: 咱们今天就来好好玩玩

translation.en: I'll make it nice and slow!
translation.zh: 我会慢慢弄死他

translation.en: Boxer!
translation.zh: 波克塞！

translation.en: Ah, yeah!
translation.zh: 好嘞！

translation.en: Come on, shoot!
translation.zh: 快射门呀！

translation.en: You wouldn't harm a member of her Majesty's household would you?
translation.zh:
你不会真的要伤害
女王陛下的家人吧？

translation.en: You would…
translation.zh: 你是来真的…

translation.en: Tyson's gone mad. I can't watch this!
translation.zh: 泰森发狂了 我看不下去了！

translation.en: It's now or never!
translation.zh: 成败在此一举了！

translation.en: Yes…
translation.zh: 好的…

translation.en: Oh, no…
translation.zh: 不…

translation.en: What…?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You're gonna pay for that, Wanda.
translation.zh: 你会为此付出代价的 旺达

translation.en: What is going on out there?
translation.zh: 这里什么情况？

translation.en: Get back to your cages.
translation.zh: 回你们的笼子里去

translation.en: Boxer?
translation.zh: 波克塞？

translation.en: You're dead, Wanda!
translation.zh: 你死定了 旺达！

translation.en: And stay in your cages! We've got a game to watch.
translation.zh: 乖乖待在笼子里！我们还要看比赛呢

translation.en: Wanda? Are you OK?
translation.zh: 旺达？你没事吧？

translation.en: I am, for now.
translation.zh: 暂时没事

translation.en: Thanks for saving my life, that was very brave of you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你救了我 你真的很勇敢

translation.en: And very foolish.
translation.zh: 而且还很愚蠢

translation.en: You two better find a way out of here.
translation.zh: 你们两个最好想办法离开这里

translation.en: Your days are numbered. I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 你们时日无多了 我跟你说

translation.en: Easier said than done.
translation.zh: 说得倒轻巧

translation.en: The way I see it,
translation.zh: 我觉得吧

translation.en: either you get picked up by a visitor, iffy odds,
translation.zh: 你要么想办法被人领养 机会渺茫

translation.en: or you beg the Chihuahua to help you out.
translation.zh: 要么去求吉娃娃帮忙

translation.en: The Chihuahua?
translation.zh: 吉娃娃？

translation.en: Don't even think about it.
translation.zh: 想都别想

translation.en: Eavesdropping again?
translation.zh: 又偷听？

translation.en: I heard it too…
translation.zh: 我也听到了…

translation.en: You said it first, Jack, never cross Tyson.
translation.zh: 杰克 你一早就说了 千万别招惹泰森

translation.en: Rule five for you. Numero uno for me!
translation.zh:
对你而言是第五条
对我来说是头号规则！

translation.en: I'm worried, Rex. Let's just hope some visitor picks you up tomorrow.
translation.zh:
我好担心 莱克斯
但愿明天会有人来把你领走吧

translation.en: I'm staying, Jack.
translation.zh: 我要留下来 杰克

translation.en: No need to put up a good stiff upper lip and all.
translation.zh: 你就别故作镇定了

translation.en: You need to tuck your tail and get as far away from here as you can.
translation.zh:
赶快夹着尾巴逃跑才是正事
逃得越远越好

translation.en: No, I don't!
translation.zh: 不 我不会逃的！

translation.en: You can't keep running away from bullies like Tyson.
translation.zh:
你们也不能一直逃避
像泰森这样的恶霸

translation.en: And how do you propose we deal with him?
translation.zh: 那你觉得我们该怎么对付他？

translation.en: You have to face reality,
translation.zh: 你得面对现实

translation.en: if it weren't for Wanda, you'd be history by now.
translation.zh: 要不是多亏了旺达 你现在已经死了

translation.en: But that's just the point.
translation.zh: 但这就是重点

translation.en: I couldn't have done it on my own.
translation.zh: 我自己一个人没法战胜他

translation.en: United we stand, divided we fall.
translation.zh: 团结则存 分裂则亡

translation.en: Our real battle isn't with Tyson, it's fear.
translation.zh:
我们真正的敌人不是泰森
而是自己的恐惧

translation.en: We conquer it, we set ourselves free.
translation.zh: 只有战胜恐惧 我们才能得到自由

translation.en: Together we can beat that tyrant.
translation.zh:
只要团结一心
我们就能打败那个暴君

translation.en: -Bravo! -So you're in?
translation.zh:
-说得好！
-那你要加入吗？

translation.en: Oh, no, but that was a great speech!
translation.zh:
那倒不会
但刚才的演讲真是振聋发聩！

translation.en: Fantastic performance. I'm quite moved.
translation.zh: 精彩绝伦的表演 我好感动

translation.en: You've really touched me… tears and everything.
translation.zh: 你真的感动到我了…我都流泪了

translation.en: You cry at the opening of a can of dog food, Bernard,
translation.zh:
看到狗粮罐头被打开
你都会流泪 伯纳德

translation.en: besides, that perro loco is going to get us all killed for sure!
translation.zh: 况且 我们都会被那条疯狗害死的！

translation.en: I told you not to get involved with strays, Rex.
translation.zh:
我早跟你说了 莱克斯
别去招惹流浪狗

translation.en: Some friend you are.
translation.zh: 你还真是个好朋友

translation.en: Here we go. Viewing time!
translation.zh: 来了 参观时间到！

translation.en: Over here!
translation.zh: 这边！

translation.en: Oh, look, the corgi!
translation.zh: 看呀 是柯基狗狗！

translation.en: No! Jack?
translation.zh: 不！杰克？

translation.en: Don't even mentioned it. That's what friends are for.
translation.zh: 不用谢 我们是朋友嘛

translation.en: I want that one, mommy.
translation.zh: 我想要这只 妈妈

translation.en: Are you sure, sweetie? Don't you want to look around first?
translation.zh:
你确定吗 宝贝？
不先看一圈再决定吗？

translation.en: No, mommy, please!
translation.zh: 不 妈妈 我就要他 求你啦！

translation.en: You got yourself a nice dog.
translation.zh: 你挑了一只好狗狗

translation.en: No, wait. I don't want to go.
translation.zh: 不 等等 我不想走

translation.en: Some dogs get all the luck.
translation.zh: 有些狗就是运气好

translation.en: Rex?
translation.zh: 莱克斯？

translation.en: Don't worry Wanda! I'll come back and save you! I promise.
translation.zh:
别担心 旺达！
我会回来救你的！我保证

translation.en: Rex!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！

translation.en: Do you want a hand, dear?
translation.zh: 要我帮你抱吗 宝贝？

translation.en: No, mommy! He is mine and I get to carry him!
translation.zh: 不 妈妈！他是我的 我要自己抱！

translation.en: Hey, no, come back!
translation.zh: 嘿 别跑 快回来！

translation.en: I want another one!
translation.zh: 我要换一只狗！

translation.en: Alright everyone, to the yard…
translation.zh: 好啦各位 去院子里玩吧

translation.en: You need some fresh air.
translation.zh: 你们需要呼吸新鲜空气

translation.en: Wanda! Over here, now.
translation.zh: 旺达！这边 过来

translation.en: We've got a score to settle.
translation.zh: 我们有一笔账要算

translation.en: He is going to destroy her, we have to do something.
translation.zh: 他会弄死她的 我们得想想办法

translation.en: Forget it, guys. This one's out of our hands.
translation.zh: 别费劲了 这事儿我们管不着

translation.en: Jack's right, we better stay out of it.
translation.zh: 杰克说得对 我们最好别掺和

translation.en: There's no stopping Tyson when he is mad.
translation.zh: 泰森发起飙来 谁也拦不住

translation.en: Why did you betray me for that pathetic Corgi?
translation.zh: 你为什么为了那只废物柯基背叛我？

translation.en: Maybe because I'm a sucker for a dog with breeding.
translation.zh: 也许因为我喜欢有教养的狗吧

translation.en: You're gonna regret your expensive tastes.
translation.zh:
喜欢那华而不实的小白脸
你会后悔的

translation.en: Rex!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！

translation.en: What are you doing here? Are you nuts?
translation.zh: 你怎么来了？你疯了吗？

translation.en: He's come back for his girl. How sweet.
translation.zh: 他回来英雄救美了 真浪漫啊

translation.en: No, I've come back for you, Tyson.
translation.zh: 不 我是回来找你的 泰森

translation.en: You're not a leader, you're a bully.
translation.zh: 你不是领袖 你只是在恃强凌弱

translation.en: You don't not earn respect, you just instil fear.
translation.zh: 你无法赢得尊重 只会制造恐惧

translation.en: And you… you've just earned the right to a good beating.
translation.zh:
而你…你刚刚赢得了
被痛揍一顿的机会

translation.en: Rex.
translation.zh: 莱克斯

translation.en: Is that all you've got?
translation.zh: 你就这点本事吗？

translation.en: We're in no rush here, are we?
translation.zh: 我们多的是时间 不是吗？

translation.en: I'm going to show you
translation.zh: 我要让你见识见识

translation.en: who's the boss around here, you little wimp.
translation.zh: 这里谁说了算 软弱无能的小子

translation.en: You actually thought someone would want to follow a loser like you?
translation.zh: 你真以为会有人追随你这样的废物？

translation.en: Who would ever be crazy enough to do that?
translation.zh: 谁会不要命了去追随你呀？

translation.en: I would.
translation.zh: 我会

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'll deal with you later. Anyone else?
translation.zh:
好吧 我晚点再收拾你
还有其他人吗？

translation.en: Me? Seriously? What have I got to do with this?
translation.zh:
我？真的假的？
这事跟我有什么关系？

translation.en: Damn it, alright, as the saying goes, united we stand.
translation.zh:
好吧 豁出去了！
俗话说得好 团结就是力量

translation.en: I second that. And for dramatic accent, you're damn right!
translation.zh:
我同意 为了增加戏剧效果
我再说一次 说得没错！

translation.en: Just, go easy on the face, please.
translation.zh: 就是拜托别打脸

translation.en: You have anger management issues.
translation.zh: 你有情绪管理方面的问题

translation.en: Anyone else got something to say? I'll take the lot of you on!
translation.zh:
还有人有话要说吗？
我可以单挑你们全部！

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Oh, that's magical, that is. The biggest sissy in here.
translation.zh:
哟 太阳打西边出来了
这里最大块头的娘娘腔也站了出来

translation.en: Sort him out, Boxer!
translation.zh: 波克塞 把他解决了！

translation.en: You're on your own, Tyson.
translation.zh: 你自己上吧 泰森

translation.en: Alright, I'll do it myself!
translation.zh: 好 我自己来！

translation.en: I'm going to enjoy this.
translation.zh: 我会好好享受的

translation.en: Bring it on, Tyson.
translation.zh: 来吧 泰森

translation.en: He can talk? Come on, big guy, let's see what you got, now!
translation.zh:
他会说话？来吧 大块头
让我们瞧瞧你的本事！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: Oh, yes!
translation.zh: 太好啦！

translation.en: -What's going on out here? -We better go!
translation.zh:
-这里什么情况？
-我们快走！

translation.en: Remember what I said about setting ourselves free.
translation.zh: 记住我说的话 战胜恐惧才能自由

translation.en: Here we go again…
translation.zh: 又来了…

translation.en: No more speeches. I actually found a way out of here.
translation.zh: 不演讲了 我找到了出去的路

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: You know, Rex, I don't want to be back on the streets.
translation.zh: 莱克斯 我不想再流落街头了

translation.en: -Chief? -It's not so bad in here.
translation.zh:
-奇夫？
-这里面其实不算太糟

translation.en: With Tyson out, this place is going to be cool.
translation.zh: 没有了泰森 这地方会很赞的

translation.en: It's very cold outside. Believe it or not, I hate winters.
translation.zh:
外面太冷了
不管你信不信 我讨厌冬天

translation.en: -Wanda? -Never thought you'd ask.
translation.zh:
-旺达？
-这还用问吗？

translation.en: Thanks, everyone.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: Can you believe this, Charlie?
translation.zh: 你能相信吗 查理？

translation.en: Rex is barely gone and they're already eliminating all traces of him.
translation.zh:
莱克斯才刚走 他们就已经在清除
所有跟他相关的东西了

translation.en: Like he was never here.
translation.zh: 就好像他从没存在过一样

translation.en: You better lay low, Nelson, or they might put you away too.
translation.zh:
你最好低调点 尼尔森
小心他们把你也打发走

translation.en: You're quite an old relic, you know.
translation.zh: 你已经是老古董了 知道吧

translation.en: How dare you?
translation.zh: 你竟敢这么跟我说话？

translation.en: Here we are! Home, sweet home!
translation.zh: 到啦！我温馨的家！

translation.en: After you, M'Lady.
translation.zh: 你先请 女士

translation.en: What have we got here, Sarge?
translation.zh: 什么情况 萨吉？

translation.en: Looks like a mongrel and a stray Corgi. Think they belong in the Palace?
translation.zh:
好像是一只杂种狗和一条流浪柯基
以为皇宫是他们的家吗？

translation.en: Sorry, you two, your type ain't welcome here.
translation.zh:
对不起了 二位
这里不欢迎你们这种狗

translation.en: Now, out you go!
translation.zh: 快走开！

translation.en: Wait, my good man. I can explain…
translation.zh: 等一下 小伙子 我可以解释…

translation.en: You see, I'm the Queen's Corgi. And this is my…
translation.zh: 我是女王的柯基 这是我的…

translation.en: Now, scram!
translation.zh: 快滚！

translation.en: Looks like they didn't recognize you. What now?
translation.zh: 他们好像不认识你 现在怎么办？

translation.en: We'll sneak back in. I know a way.
translation.zh: 我们偷偷溜回去 我知道路

translation.en: Hold on now! I know there was a hole in this wall, right here!
translation.zh:
等一下！这面墙上
原本有个洞的 就在这里！

translation.en: That's how we escaped.
translation.zh: 我们之前就是从这逃出来的

translation.en: Well, it's gone. So what do we do?
translation.zh: 可它现在封上了 怎么办？

translation.en: I don't know any other way in.
translation.zh: 我不知道其他入口了

translation.en: I've got an idea.
translation.zh: 我有个主意

translation.en: Wanda!
translation.zh: 旺达！

translation.en: I can't keep up. You are running too fast for me.
translation.zh: 我跟不上你 你跑得太快了

translation.en: Right then. Wait for me here. I won't be too long.
translation.zh: 好吧 在这等我 我马上回来

translation.en: But where are you…
translation.zh: 可你要去哪…

translation.en: What? I'm dead?
translation.zh: 什么？我死了？

translation.en: Come on, Charlie, the Queen is waiting.
translation.zh: 快来呀 查理 女王在等你了

translation.en: It's your coronation for goodness sake. You don't want to be late.
translation.zh: 今天是你的加冕典礼 可别迟到了

translation.en: Hush, you old fool.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 老笨蛋

translation.en: Once I'm the new Top Dog, there will be some changes around here.
translation.zh:
等我成为新一任首席狗狗
这里的规矩就得改改了

translation.en: First, I shall levy a 50% dinner tax.
translation.zh: 首先 我要收50%的用餐税

translation.en: I say, don't you think that's a bit stiff?
translation.zh: 我说 你不觉得这税有点太重了吗？

translation.en: Secondly, I wish to be referred to at all times as "My Lord",
translation.zh:
第二 无论何时何地
都要称呼我为“大人”

translation.en: except on informal occasions when you may call me, "My Liege".
translation.zh:
除了在非正式场合
你们可以叫我“主人”

translation.en: Yes… My Liege, Lord.
translation.zh: 是…主人 大人

translation.en: Thirdly, when I pass by, I require you to avert your eyes.
translation.zh: 第三 我经过时 你们要回避视线

translation.en: Not too much, sort of like this…
translation.zh: 不用做得太夸张 像这样就行…

translation.en: Do I make myself clear?
translation.zh: 听明白了吗？

translation.en: Yes, my Lord, Liege.
translation.zh: 是 大人 主人

translation.en: I did not quite hear that! Go on!
translation.zh: 我没听见！再说一遍！

translation.en: -Yes, my Liege Lord. -Yes, my Lord, Liege.
translation.zh:
-是 我的主人大人
-是 大人 主人

translation.en: Very well then.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: In that case, you may be excused while I prepare myself for the coronation.
translation.zh:
行吧 你们可以走了
我还要为加冕典礼做准备呢

translation.en: Charlie's mad as a hatter!
translation.zh: 查理真是得意忘形了！

translation.en: Makes one miss dear old Rex.
translation.zh: 不由得让我想念起了莱克斯

translation.en: -Rex! -Wanda!
translation.zh:
-莱克斯！
-旺达！

translation.en: Rex, I've got a surprise for you…
translation.zh: 莱克斯 我给你带来了一个惊喜…

translation.en: Wait… I have some big news to share. It seems…
translation.zh:
慢着…我有一个大新闻
要告诉你 我好像…

translation.en: I'm dead!
translation.zh: 死了！

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你胡说什么呢？

translation.en: See, right there, my own funeral.
translation.zh: 你看 那上面刊登了我的葬礼

translation.en: -Is that the Queen? -Yes, and the cross below it's me.
translation.zh:
-那是女王吗？
-对 下面这个十字架里的就是我

translation.en: That would explain why nobody came looking for you.
translation.zh: 难怪没有人来找过你

translation.en: Precisely!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: Charlie had the whole thing figured out and now he's going to become Top Dog!
translation.zh:
查理精心策划了这一切
现在他要当上首席狗狗了！

translation.en: Oh no, he's not.
translation.zh: 才怪 他休想

translation.en: -He isn't? -Not if we can help it!
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-他得先过了我们这关！

translation.en: -We? -Hi, kid!
translation.zh:
-我们？
-你好呀 小子！

translation.en: -Surprise! -Jack!
translation.zh:
-惊喜吧！
-杰克！

translation.en: Rule seven. Wanda does not take no for an answer.
translation.zh: 规则第七条 旺达不接受拒绝

translation.en: United…
translation.zh: 团结…

translation.en: -We… -Stand!
translation.zh:
-就是…
-力量！

translation.en: Great to see you, guys.
translation.zh: 见到你们真是太好啦

translation.en: How exactly did you manage to get them out of the pound?
translation.zh: 你是怎么把他们带出犬舍来的？

translation.en: You don't wanna know.
translation.zh: 你不会想知道的

translation.en: Maybe not. But, I like the way you think.
translation.zh: 也许吧 但我喜欢你的思维方式

translation.en: Let's move out.
translation.zh: 我们出发吧

translation.en: Bernard has a great idea to get us into the palace.
translation.zh:
伯纳德有一个绝妙的点子
能让我们进入皇宫

translation.en: Where is that blasted dog?
translation.zh: 那条傻狗怎么还没来？

translation.en: Hurry him along a little, will you?
translation.zh: 你去催催他吧

translation.en: Let's go, guys.
translation.zh: 走吧 伙计们

translation.en: Come here!
translation.zh: 过来！

translation.en: Stop them.
translation.zh: 拦住他们

translation.en: What…?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Get them!
translation.zh: 抓住他们！

translation.en: This way!
translation.zh: 这边！

translation.en: Who's the Queen's Top Dog?
translation.zh: 谁是女王的首席狗狗？

translation.en: That would be me… Charlie.
translation.zh: 是我…查理

translation.en: It appears I have arrived right on time
translation.zh: 似乎我来得正是时候

translation.en: to prevent the Queen from making a very bad mistake.
translation.zh: 女王差一点就要让你的阴谋得逞了

translation.en: You're alive!
translation.zh: 你还活着！

translation.en: How could you betray me?
translation.zh: 你怎么能背叛我呢？

translation.en: You were my best friend, Charlie.
translation.zh: 你可是我最好的朋友呀 查理

translation.en: Of course we are friends, Rex..
translation.zh: 我当然是你的朋友啦 莱克斯…

translation.en: No, we are not, you push me off the bridge.
translation.zh: 你不是 你把我推下了桥

translation.en: How absurd. You slipped and fell.
translation.zh:
胡说什么呢
是你自己滑倒了摔下去的

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -Charlie, meet Wanda. -Charmed, I'm sure.
translation.zh:
-查理 见过旺达
-幸会啊

translation.en: I'll show you there was no foul play. The proof is in the closet.
translation.zh:
其实根本没什么阴谋
我可以证明给你看 证据就在壁橱里

translation.en: What proof? I know what happened, Charlie.
translation.zh:
什么证据？
我知道发生了什么事 查理

translation.en: I was there, remember?
translation.zh: 我是亲眼所见的 记得吗？

translation.en: Just open the door, you'll see.
translation.zh: 你去开门看看就知道了

translation.en: I'll do it.
translation.zh: 我来吧

translation.en: No, Wanda, this could be a trick.
translation.zh: 不 旺达 这可能是个圈套

translation.en: Game over, Rex.
translation.zh: 游戏结束了 莱克斯

translation.en: You survived the ice, show me how you deal with fire!
translation.zh:
之前没冻死你
我就不信这回还烧不死你了！

translation.en: Now, forgive me, I've got a Golden Collar to receive.
translation.zh:
那么 失陪了
还有一个金项圈等着我去戴呢

translation.en: There you are, come this way, you're expected!
translation.zh: 你在这儿呀 快过去吧 就等你了！

translation.en: Wanda give us some help here.
translation.zh: 旺达 快来帮帮忙

translation.en: Wanda?
translation.zh: 旺达？

translation.en: Wanda, where are you?
translation.zh: 旺达 你在哪儿？

translation.en: Wanda!
translation.zh: 旺达！

translation.en: Wanda?
translation.zh: 旺达？

translation.en: What's happening?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: -Rex? -Don't move. I'm getting you out of here.
translation.zh:
-莱克斯？
-别动 我送你出去

translation.en: What about you?
translation.zh: 那你呢？

translation.en: It's too heavy for two.
translation.zh: 它带不动两个人

translation.en: No. I don't want to leave you.
translation.zh: 不 我不要离开你

translation.en: Farewell… Wanda.
translation.zh: 永别了…旺达

translation.en: Following the passing of my dear Rexy…
translation.zh: 在我心爱的莱克斯去世后…

translation.en: Perhaps, I should have taken a little nap earlier.
translation.zh: 我之前真该先打个盹儿

translation.en: …it is beholden upon me, to bequeath the Golden Collar to his best friend…
translation.zh:
…能够把他遗留下来的金项圈
交给他最好的朋友 我很欣慰…

translation.en: Where is the Golden Collar?
translation.zh: 金项圈呢？

translation.en: What a circus.
translation.zh: 都什么乱七八糟的

translation.en: Hey! Guys!
translation.zh: 嘿！大伙儿！

translation.en: Wanda?
translation.zh: 旺达？

translation.en: Up here!
translation.zh: 我在上面！

translation.en: I didn't know she could fly.
translation.zh: 我都不知道她还会飞呀

translation.en: What are you doing up there?
translation.zh: 你在天上做什么？

translation.en: Trying to save Rex!
translation.zh: 我要去救莱克斯！

translation.en: What did she say?
translation.zh: 她说什么？

translation.en: Catch her!
translation.zh: 接住她！

translation.en: I got her!
translation.zh: 我来了！

translation.en: Where'd she go?
translation.zh: 她人呢？

translation.en: Hello!?
translation.zh: 在这儿呢！

translation.en: She vanished right into thin air!
translation.zh: 她凭空消失了！

translation.en: -That was pretty cool. -Enough fooling around.
translation.zh:
-真酷
-别闹了

translation.en: If we don't get in there, Rex will be burned to a crisp!
translation.zh:
再不进去救人
莱克斯就要被烧焦了！

translation.en: Dudes, we gotta save Rex!
translation.zh: 兄弟们 我们得去营救莱克斯！

translation.en: I once played a scene where I rushed into a burning building.
translation.zh: 我以前演过一出冲进火场救人的戏

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: Help me!
translation.zh: 帮帮我！

translation.en: I'll get this. Move out of the way.
translation.zh: 我来搞定 让开

translation.en: I can't see a thing!
translation.zh: 我什么都看不见！

translation.en: -Me neither! -Rex!
translation.zh:
-我也是！
-莱克斯！

translation.en: Rex? Wanda?
translation.zh: 莱克斯？旺达？

translation.en: Guys! We need to put out this fire, now!
translation.zh: 我们得赶快把火扑灭！

translation.en: Jack. You and Chief get the hose at the end of the hall.
translation.zh: 杰克 你和奇夫去拿走廊尽头的水管

translation.en: Okay, got it.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: Al, Bernard, come with me.
translation.zh: 艾尔、伯纳德 跟我来

translation.en: Oh, dear.
translation.zh: 真要命

translation.en: How we gonna get the hose out?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么把水管拿出来呀？

translation.en: I've got this.
translation.zh: 我来

translation.en: Nice work, Chief!
translation.zh: 好样的 奇夫！

translation.en: Yes, that's it. Perfect.
translation.zh: 对 就是这里 太好了

translation.en: Hold it tight.
translation.zh: 拿稳了

translation.en: I need help here!
translation.zh: 我需要帮忙！

translation.en: I got it.
translation.zh: 我来搞定

translation.en: Easy does it.
translation.zh: 小心点呀！

translation.en: I think I've got the hang of this.
translation.zh: 我好像已经掌握窍门了

translation.en: Let a woman show you how it's done.
translation.zh: 本小姐来给你演示一下该怎么做

translation.en: What are you waiting for?
translation.zh: 还等什么呢？

translation.en: Coming!
translation.zh: 来啦！

translation.en: Does anyone see Rex?
translation.zh: 有人看见莱克斯了吗？

translation.en: Look at this place, there is no way he made it…
translation.zh:
瞧这里都成什么样儿了
他铁定没命了…

translation.en: Rex!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！

translation.en: He is nowhere in sight.
translation.zh: 到处都不见他的踪影

translation.en: Rex!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！

translation.en: Rex!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！

translation.en: I heard something!
translation.zh: 我听到有声音！

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 什么声音？

translation.en: Up here.
translation.zh: 在上面

translation.en: It's Rex! Rex!
translation.zh: 是莱克斯！莱克斯！

translation.en: Wanda.
translation.zh: 旺达

translation.en: He is in chimney.
translation.zh: 他在烟囱里

translation.en: Come down, what are you waiting for?
translation.zh: 快下来呀 你还等什么呢？

translation.en: I am stuck.
translation.zh: 我被卡住了

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: How sweet!
translation.zh: 真浪漫！

translation.en: Wait…
translation.zh: 等一下…

translation.en: You guys deal with this situation.
translation.zh: 这里交给你们了

translation.en: I'll be right back! I've got something to take care of.
translation.zh: 我马上回来！有点事要办

translation.en: And so, on this most wonderful coronation day,
translation.zh: 所以 在这无比美好的加冕日

translation.en: we mark a new chapter, a new beginning…
translation.zh:
我们即将开启新的篇章
一个新的开始…

translation.en: My goodness!
translation.zh: 天呀！

translation.en: What in the world is going on here?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Give me my gold collar back!
translation.zh: 把我的金项圈还给我！

translation.en: Come here!
translation.zh: 过来！

translation.en: Give me that collar!
translation.zh: 把项圈交出来！

translation.en: Come on, Bernard. Push, higher.
translation.zh: 加油 伯纳德 再往上推一点

translation.en: That hurts.
translation.zh: 可真疼呀

translation.en: -But at least we've got you back. -I have your collar.
translation.zh:
-但至少我们把你救回来啦
-我把你的项圈带来了

translation.en: Wanda!
translation.zh: 旺达！

translation.en: Well, look at this sorry bunch of wannabees
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你们这群跳梁小丑呀

translation.en: I can see you trashed this room pretty good.
translation.zh: 这房间都被你们糟蹋成什么样了

translation.en: Us?
translation.zh: 我们？

translation.en: Rex! You're back!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！你回来啦！

translation.en: Guys! It's so great to see you.
translation.zh: 伙计们！见到你们太高兴啦

translation.en: What exactly is going on here, Charlie?
translation.zh: 这里发生了什么事 查理？

translation.en: Seems Charlie here wants to be Top Dog so bad,
translation.zh:
看来我们这位查理
想当首席狗狗想疯了

translation.en: he'd risk burning down the whole palace for it.
translation.zh: 哪怕为此烧毁整座皇宫也在所不惜

translation.en: You did this, Charlie!?
translation.zh: 这是你干的吗 查理？

translation.en: This is our home.
translation.zh: 这可是我们的家呀

translation.en: Stay out of it you two.
translation.zh: 你们两个别掺合

translation.en: I'm going to settle this once and for all.
translation.zh: 我要彻底解决这件事

translation.en: Then you're a lot dumber than you look, mate.
translation.zh: 那你可比看起来的还要笨多了 伙计

translation.en: You hoped I would drown when you pushed me off that bridge.
translation.zh: 你把我推下桥 就是想把我淹死

translation.en: True.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Or maybe you thought I'd end up in some gutter
translation.zh: 又或者你以为我会流落到某个贫民窟

translation.en: homeless and unwanted.
translation.zh: 无家可归 无人问津

translation.en: No. I did think you'd drown.
translation.zh: 不 我真的以为你会被淹死

translation.en: We could always make them arrangements for you, you know.
translation.zh: 这方面我们倒是可以为你安排安排

translation.en: I am with you there, Chief.
translation.zh: 我附议 奇夫

translation.en: In any event, I'm about to be Top Dog and my word is golden,
translation.zh:
不管怎样 我就要成为首席狗狗了
我说的话就是权威

translation.en: so to speak.
translation.zh: 可以这么说

translation.en: No, you're not, Charlie.
translation.zh: 查理 你别痴心妄想了

translation.en: I say, once Top Dog, always Top Dog.
translation.zh: 要我说 一日为首席 终生为首席

translation.en: Why should he be the Queen's top Corgi?
translation.zh: 他凭什么当女王的首席柯基？

translation.en: I've served her Majesty well, and I have seniority!
translation.zh:
我把女王陛下服侍得很好
而且我比他有资历！

translation.en: I'm entitled!
translation.zh: 理应由我来！

translation.en: Enough of your blabbering. You tried and you failed.
translation.zh:
别胡言乱语了
你已经尝试过 但是失败了

translation.en: No, Wanda.
translation.zh: 不 旺达

translation.en: But, I thought this is what you wanted…
translation.zh: 可这不就是你想要的吗…

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: All you've ever talked about was being Top Dog.
translation.zh: 你一直在说当首席狗狗的事

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.zh: 我已经不在乎了

translation.en: If Charlie wants it that bad, let him have it.
translation.zh:
既然查理那么想当首席
就让他当好了

translation.en: All I care about is being your Top Dog.
translation.zh: 只要在你心里 我是第一位的就够了

translation.en: You're top of my list.
translation.zh: 我最在乎的只有你

translation.en: I do like a great love scene.
translation.zh: 我真喜欢甜蜜的恋爱场景

translation.en: That's what I call a real class act.
translation.zh: 这才叫经典名场面呀

translation.en: You don't mean this…
translation.zh: 你不会是要把这个…

translation.en: -Do you? -I do!
translation.zh:
-让给我吧？
-没错！

translation.en: Oh, my goodness, what in the world happened here?
translation.zh: 天呀 这里到底是怎么了？

translation.en: Rex! You're alive!
translation.zh: 莱克斯！你还活着！

translation.en: It's all been a terrible mistake.
translation.zh: 这真是一场可怕的误会

translation.en: We thought the fox had…
translation.zh: 我们还以为你被狐狸…

translation.en: I missed you so very much.
translation.zh: 我好想你

translation.en: Oh, dear, this room is going to need some freshening up.
translation.zh: 天呐 这个房间需要好好翻新一下

translation.en: Rex… So, that's where you've been. Looking for love.
translation.zh: 莱克斯…原来你是去追寻真爱了呀

translation.en: You've got good taste, Rexy!
translation.zh: 你很有品味哟 小莱莱！

translation.en: Love moves us all in mysterious ways, isn't that right, Phillip?
translation.zh:
爱情就是有一种神秘的力量
能带给我们动力 对吗 菲利普？

translation.en: What? Oh, yes! Very mysterious indeed.
translation.zh: 什么？噢 对呀！确实非常神秘

translation.en: Shall I call the guards to get rid of all these dogs?
translation.zh: 要我叫警卫把这些狗赶走吗？

translation.en: That won't be necessary. It's high time we had some new blood in the palace.
translation.zh:
不用了
皇宫里是时候迎来新鲜血液啦

translation.en: Seriously? You mean the whole lot?
translation.zh: 真的假的？全留下吗？

translation.en: Why not? This is a big place.
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？这里地方大着呢

translation.en: I thought you had eyes only for Corgis.
translation.zh: 我以为你只喜欢柯基呢

translation.en: -One is never too old to change. -If you say so.
translation.zh:
-老年人也是会变的嘛
-你说了算吧

translation.en: But, who is going to be the Top Dog then?
translation.zh: 但这样一来 谁来当首席狗狗呢？

translation.en: Well, it's pretty obvious to me that Rexy has already made that call.
translation.zh:
在我看来这很明显了呀
小莱莱已经做了决定

translation.en: After all, love and Royal duties can make for difficult bedfellows.
translation.zh:
毕竟 真爱和皇室责任
有时是无法二者兼顾的

translation.en: It worked rather well for us, didn't it, dear?
translation.zh:
我们俩就处理得很好
不是吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Yes, my dear, we are old school.
translation.zh: 是呀 亲爱的 我们都是老派的人

translation.en: Well, come along then.
translation.zh: 快跟上来吧

translation.en: The lot of you could use a bit of freshening up!
translation.zh: 你们都需要好好梳洗一下啦！

translation.en: Afterwards, we shall have a wonderful dinner.
translation.zh:
在那之后
我们要享用一顿丰盛的晚餐

translation.en: Dudes! We're gonna live in a palace!
translation.zh: 伙计们！我们要住在宫殿里啦！

translation.en: This is so exciting.
translation.zh: 我好激动呀！

translation.en: That's what you'd call a happy ending, right, Bernard?
translation.zh:
这就是你说的
圆满结局了吧 伯纳德？

translation.en: So, you are going to let Charlie of the hook, just like that?
translation.zh: 你打算就这么轻易放过查理了吗？

translation.en: Oh, he is not off the hook.
translation.zh: 他的麻烦在后头呢

translation.en: He has no idea what he got himself into, believe me.
translation.zh:
相信我 他根本不知道
等待着自己的是什么

translation.en: -After you, Milady. -Oh, Rex…
translation.zh:
-你先请 女士
-噢 莱克斯…

translation.en: Charlie, just keep in mind that being Top Dog
translation.zh: 查理 别忘了哦 身为首席狗狗

translation.en: means you'll have a huge set of responsibilities.
translation.zh: 意味着要背负无与伦比的责任

translation.en: No, this is not happening. I want to abdicate! Yes, abdicate.
translation.zh: 不 我不干 我要退位让贤！对 退位

translation.en: I am not cut out to be Top Dog! Please!
translation.zh: 我不是当首席狗狗的料！拜托！

translation.en: That's what you get when you're Top Dog!
translation.zh: 这就叫欲戴王冠 必承其重！
